services.title: Comprehensive IVF Consultation & Care
text: Our IVF services provide personalized reproductive care using cutting-edge technology and compassionate support.
We assess fertility health, provide treatment options, and guide you through every step of your journey toward parenthood.

points.text: Advanced IVF techniques tailored to your needs
Dedicated team with years of experience in reproductive medicine

services.more_text: We offer holistic IVF treatment—from evaluation to embryo transfer—with full transparency, emotional support, and medical excellence.

content.text: We specialize in various IVF procedures including conventional IVF, ICSI, and embryo freezing.
Our success rates are among the highest, owing to experienced embryologists and strict quality control.
We guide patients on lifestyle adjustments, medication compliance, and post-treatment care for best outcomes.
Our support team ensures you’re never alone in the journey. We provide 24x7 assistance and emotional counseling.

services.additional_text: Our IVF services are structured to be affordable without compromising quality, with flexible payment options and transparent pricing.

additional_points.text: Detailed explanation of all costs before you start

services.title: Safe and Effective IUI Treatments
text: IUI (Intrauterine Insemination) is a simple, cost-effective fertility treatment ideal for couples with unexplained infertility or mild male factors.
Our clinic uses advanced screening and preparation techniques to improve success rates.

points.text: Experienced team ensures optimal timing and monitoring

services.more_text: Our IUI service offers quick recovery, minimal discomfort, and high success rates with appropriate patient selection.

content.text: IUI is suitable for cases such as low sperm count, cervical issues, or ovulation problems.
Success depends on factors such as age, sperm quality, and ovarian response. We monitor closely to increase your chances.
Mild medications, tracking ovulation, and rest post-procedure can improve IUI outcomes.
points: Avoid stress and physical exertion post IUI

content.text: We offer pre-IUI counseling, emotional support, and close communication throughout the process.

services.additional_text: IUI is a low-cost fertility option that can be repeated over cycles to improve the chances of conception with minimal intervention.

additional_points.text: Short recovery time, no sedation needed
